messages.subject: HUGE Thanks.....
messages.msgSnippet: To all who answered my question about about how you start homeschooling and particularly about my son s interests in wood shop and auto mechanics. You all
messages.messageBody:
To all who answered my question about about how you "start" homeschooling and
particularly about my son's interests in wood shop and auto mechanics. You
all gave me excellent ideas and my mind is just ticking away with things we
can do now. Also, I MUCH appreciate those of you who shared that you didnt
just smoothly unschool right out of the box but that, it appears, it is a
growth process not only for the kids but for us as well. And I think the
biggest thing I gleaned from you all is to RELAX!
With lots of thanks and feeling more encouraged,
Julie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
